  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120612</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120612</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Sila na gibajoče delce po vodniku: najdi smer polja</string>
            <string language="en">Force on moving charges  in a current carrying wire: find the direction of the field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft auf bewegenden Ladungen in einer aktuellen 
tragenden Leitung: finden Sie die Richtung auffangene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force sur les frais en mouvement dans un fil 
portant actuel : trouvez la direction de la zone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força em cargas móveis em um fio carregando 
atual: encontre o sentido do campo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza sulle spese muoventesi in un legare 
trasportante corrente: trovi il senso del campo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη στην κίνηση των δαπανών σε ένα παρόν 
φέρνοντας καλώδιο: βρείτε την κατεύθυνση του πεδίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza en cargas de mudanza en un alambre que 
lleva actual: encuentre la dirección del campo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Nabiti delci potujejo po vodniku z/brez vpliva magnetnega polja.</string>
            <string language="en">Charged particles are moving along the wire through the magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetna sila</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Belastete Partikel bewegen entlang die Leitung 
durch das magnetische auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les particules chargées se déplacent le long du
fil par le champ magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As partículas carregadas estão movendo-se ao 
longo do fio através do campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le particelle caricate stanno muovendosi lungo il
legare attraverso il campo magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα χρεωμένα μόρια κινούνται κατά μήκος του καλωδίου 
μέσω του μαγνητικού πεδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las partículas cargadas se están moviendo a lo 
largo del alambre a través del campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força magnética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza magnetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza magnética</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
